TopicTitle: Bil, Jeb, Bob, not in Persistance File

Articles.Content: So the first time I got KSP (.17), I never started with the original crew. I searched through the persistance file and those 3 were not listed. Could someone either post a fix or a copy of their original persistance data?
They should be the first 3 Kerbals, try deleting your save and starting a new one
Yeah, but I have some things currently going on (satelittes etc.) and I REALLY don't want to delete my save file.

Okay then, lets see if this works

{

version = 0.17.0

UT = 0.0

activeVessel = 1

CREW

{

name = Jebediah Kerman

brave = 0.5

dumb = 0.5

badS = True

state = 0

ToD = 8988.62007334269

idx = 0

}

CREW

{

name = Bill Kerman

brave = 0.5

dumb = 0.8

badS = False

state = 0

ToD = 18232.8600733898

idx = 0

}

CREW

{

name = Bob Kerman

brave = 0.3

dumb = 0.1

badS = False

state = 0

ToD = 13434.2311281259

idx = 0

}
My UT on my persistance file is different from the one there, if I replace it will it cause any changes?
I set it to 0 but you can use your own UT, I suggest you make a copy of your persistence file before you attempt this.
Alright, I'll try it now. What is UT?
The in-game time I think, it'll determine the positions of all the planets, and all the things around the planets.
